magpie.models.classification

Interface AbstractClassifier

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseClassifier, CumulantExpansionClassifier, SplitClassifier, WekaClassifier

    public interface AbstractClassifier
    Interface that defines what operations a Classifier must fulfill
